title: Loading screen DC
body: This is garbage riot, I've been disconnecting during your loading screens after champ selection and then I have to reload the game and every time I come back my team has remake and then I get leaver buster, fix your shit cause it's not me, I have top notch ISP and have never been disconnected from any other online game in my life other than this garbage fix it or I'm out you pod company

replies.body:
Let's take a step back and look at what might be causing these DC's together.

Even if your ISP is ok, there may still be other connection interruptions (though good on you for checking yours first). I'd check to make sure that your firewall isn't potentially blocking LoL from playing by troubleshooting it with [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3). You'd be surprised how much an antivirus does that you DON'T want it to do.

Let me know if that helps out or if you keep getting disconnects! :)
